title: Rep. Andy Barr, Corporate Diversity, 2020
itunes:title: Rep. Andy Barr, Corporate Diversity, 2020
description:
Guests: Ryan Teague Beckwith, Bloomberg National Political Reporter, Brad Blakeman, Republican Strategist and Former Deputy Assistant to Pres. George W. Bush, Congressman Andy Barr, a Republican representing Kentucky's 6th district, and Adam Hodge, Senior Vice President at Ariel Investments.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
